definition: variant of 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
(final exclamatory particle)
see 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
to suck/to incite

sentences.english: There's no need for the manager to labour the point.
sentences.chinese: 經理沒必要對這一點囉唆。

sentences.english: I know I'm a in the neck. I just want you to be happy.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我很囉唆，可是這是妳的終身大事。

sentences.english: Her sentences are encumbered by modifying clauses.
sentences.chinese: 她的句子因爲修飾性從句多而顯得囉唆。

definition: long-winded/wordy/troublesome/pesky/also pr. [luo1 suo1]
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to contradict (elders or superiors)
(dialect) hen/prostitute/(Tw) interfering/nosy/busybody (from Taiwanese 家婆, Tai-lo pr. [ke-pô])
impolite/cheeky/impudent
to talk back/to answer back
to twist words and force logic (idiom)/sophistry/loud rhetoric making up for fallacious argument/shoving false arguments down people's throats
words do not convey the meaning/poorly expressed/senseless/inarticulate
to be a real headache/to find sth a real headache/to beat one's brains
to stomp or hop about (in anxiety, anger etc)/to dance on one's feet/hopping mad (anxious, etc)
to blurt out without thinking (idiom)
flustered and exasperated/utterly discomfited
(of a girl) to feign anger coquettishly
to take one's anger out on sb (who does not deserve it)
to rebuff/to refuse/to turn down
to order sb about/to use sb
